英文公告.機關地址: No.37, Lequn St., West District, Taichung City 403, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.標案名稱: Investigation of stream status of Dajia River
英文公告.附加說明: 1.Those who choose to pick up permits in person should double check for missing pages or procurement stamps and demand immediate amendments.2.Electronic procurement bids shall be deemed invalid without an attached statement of electronic receipt (receipt serial numbers should be all different).3.Bidding documents shall be sealed and delivered via courier service or designated personnel at the bureau by the specified deadline.4.Required documents are listed in the Bidding Manual. Only copies of the original documents are accepted. 5.Participating companies with legal or other concerns over the content of bidding documents should notify the bureau at least three days before the bidding date with a written statement. Concerns raised after the deadline will not be considered.6.Please refer to the Bidding Manual for security deposit guarantee.7.Letters reporting illegal conduct of relevant sectors shall be sent to the Procurement and Audit Section of the MOEA by email at ps.unit@moea.gov.tw or the Hydrology Agency of MOEA at PO Box 7, Taichung Post Office Divion 47 or reported by calling (04)22501578.
